謟字的基本解释

謟
tāo
可疑：“天道不謟，不贰其命。”
超越本分：“帝念不謟，应时作谋。”
隐瞒：“不謟过，不责得。”

謟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tāo］
［《廣韻》土刀切，平豪，透。］
(1)疑惑。
(2)僭差。
(3)诞妄。
(4)隐讳。参见“謟過”。

謟字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　謟； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1176第06
【廣韻】土刀切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】他刀切，?音叨。【爾雅·釋詁】疑也。【左傳·昭二十六年】天道不謟，不貳其命。【釋文】謟，本又作慆。又【二十七年】天命不慆久矣。【註】慆，疑也。　又【集韻】叨号切，叨去聲。義同。　毛氏曰：从言从舀，與諂諛字不同。

考證：〔【左傳·昭二十六年】天道不謟，不貳其命。【註】謟，本又作慆。〕　謹照原文註字改釋文。〔【哀十七年】天命不慆久矣。〕　謹按此昭二十七年傳非哀十七年傳，今照原文哀字改二字。

謟字的起名意思

暂无。

謟
Basic explanation of words
謟
tāo
Suspicious: "The way of heaven is not scorned, nor is it fate."
Exceeding duty: "The emperor has no thoughts, but makes plans in time."
Conceal: "Don't bluff, don't blame it."
謟
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tāo］
["Guangyun" soil knife cut, Pinghao, thorough. ]
(1) Doubts.
(2) An arrogant error.
(3) Abnormal.
(4) Concealment. See "謟过".
謟
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　謟; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1176 Page 06
[Guang Yun] Earth knife cuts [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] He cuts with the knife,? 【Erya·Release】Suspicious. [Zuo Zhuan · Zhao 26 years] The way of heaven does not succumb to its fate. 【Explanation】謟, this is also melancholy. Also [twenty-seven years] the destiny is not for a long time. [Note] melancholy, suspicious.　[Jiyun] 叨号切, 叨出声。 The same meaning.　Mao's said: Cong Yan Cong Jiao is different from flattering words. Textual research: [[Zuo Zhuan · Zhao Twenty-Six Years] Heaven does not succumb to its fate. 【Note】謟, this is also melancholy. 〕　I would like to modify the interpretation based on the original text. 〔【Seventeen years of mourning】The fate is not for a long time. 〔〕 　 I would like to press this Scripture in the 27th year of Zhao but not the passage of the 17th year of Ai, and now I am changing the two words according to the original text.
